title: Malzahar Mana Cost Display Bug
body:
Following the Mid-Patch Balance Update, it would seem that the mana cost previews on Malzahar's Q and W have not been updated

[In-game Screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/rPcRuf2.jpg)
[Proof of Update](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-69-notes#patch-10/05/2016)

It's nothing major, just a small thing that caused some confusion during a game

replies.body: the hotfix was only applied server side, it requires a patch to change the tooltips, they know of this bug atm and will be sorted next patch, dont fret

1: Post on report a bug
2: Already been posted and probably been worked on its over 200 upvotes so wait for next patch
This usually happens with Hotfixes. It should be fixed next patch.
